text: Pamela Sue Martin (born January 5, 1953 in Hartford, Connecticut) is an American actress. She played Nancy Drew in The Hardy Boys/Nancy Drew Mysteries. She played Fallon Carrington Colby in the television series Dynasty. She also acted in other television programs and movies. Category:Actors from Hartford, Connecticut Category:American television actors Category:1953 births Category:Living people
title: Pamela Sue Martin
